title: Enhancing AI Competency in Practice: Mobile-Based Mathematics Education Design Reflecting Cultural Conditioning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of intermediate-level courses in related fields or equivalent experience
context.additional_context: Advanced AI/machine learning technical course for AI/ML practitioners

learning_goals: Using graph-text composite materials, learners will achieve over 80% accuracy in mathematical problem-solving.
Learners will identify three or more learning material types suitable for their cultural environment (based on power distance criteria).
Learners will voluntarily complete learning modules at least three times per week in a mobile environment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
